forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: restoring deleted things

comments.text: you can find a listing of your recently deleted placements by opening the inventory, and clicking on the trash icon. this is a way to undo accidental deletions.

thread.latestCommentText: you can find a listing of your recently deleted placements by opening the inventory, and clicking on the trash icon. this is a way to undo accidental deletions.
